[Java] Class TenantPooledDataSource

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.commons.dbcp.BasicDataSource
      TenantPooledDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
TenantDataSource
public class TenantPooledDataSource
extends org.apache.commons.dbcp.BasicDataSource

This class allows pooled data sources to be used for multiple tenant databases.
